techmeme.title: A website for "$TRUMP Wallet" launches, saying it is "The Official $TRUMP Wallet by President Trump" powered by NFT service Magic Eden, and opens a waitlist (Molly White/Citation Needed)
TikTok expands Manage Topics, a feature that lets users customize how often specific topics appear in the For You feed, and adds AI-powered keyword filtering (Emma Roth/The Verge)
Nintendo says it didn't send any Switch 2 review units to outlets as "important features and updates" will only be available via an update on its June 5 launch (Andy Robinson/Video Games Chronicle)
Some researchers say it looks like DeepSeek may have used Google Gemini to help train its R1-0528 reasoning model (Kyle Wiggers/TechCrunch)
How AppLovin, which lets advertisers use IP addresses to track users, began eroding Google's ad market share and pushed Google to loosen its privacy stance (Catherine Perloff/The Information)
